RecordingMode.description: Thumbnail Recording Mode, which determines whether thumbnails are recorded at an interval or are disabled.
RecordingMode.markdownDescription:
Thumbnail Recording Mode, which determines whether thumbnails are recorded at an interval or are disabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: INTERVAL | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetIntervalSeconds.description: Target Interval Seconds defines the interval at which thumbnails are recorded. This field is required if RecordingMode is INTERVAL.
TargetIntervalSeconds.markdownDescription:
Target Interval Seconds defines the interval at which thumbnails are recorded. This field is required if RecordingMode is INTERVAL.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Resolution.description: Resolution indicates the desired resolution of recorded thumbnails.
Resolution.markdownDescription:
Resolution indicates the desired resolution of recorded thumbnails.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FULL_HD | HD | SD | LOWEST_RESOLUTION  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:

Arn.description: Recording Configuration ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Recording Configuration ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z]*:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:recording-configuration/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
